pages.text: Tool progression in CreatePunk is slightly different to that of vanilla.$(br2)In general, progression has been spread out, with some tweaks to durability. Additionally, steel tools have been added as a tier between iron and diamond tools.

pages.title: Wood and Stone Tools
pages.text: Wood and stone tools have had their durability significantly reduced.

pages.title: Iron Tools
pages.text: Tools better than iron have been pushed back significantly, so iron tools have had their durabilities increased to compensate.
Steel and diamond tools require nether access, and as such the diamond chisel has been added as a weak diamond pickaxe in order to obtain obsidian.

pages.title: Steel Tools
pages.text: Steel tools can mine anything that diamond can, but are slightly slower and less durable. See $(l:materials/alloying#steel)alloying/$ to learn more about making steel.

pages.title: Diamond Tools
pages.text: Diamond tools have had their durabilities slightly increased to account for being pushed back in the tech tree. See $(l:materials/alloying#diamondium)alloying/$ to learn more about making diamondium.

pages.title: Netherite Tools
pages.text: Netherite tools have had their durabilities significantly increased to account for the requirement of accessing the end. See $(l:materials/alloying#netherite)alloying/$ to learn more about making netherite.
